sentences.en: Accessibility and general weather prospects further restrict the choice.
sentences.cn: 可达到的条件和一般的气象资料进一步限制了选择.

sentences.en: Change the language, and set installation and accessibility options.
sentences.cn: 更改语言并设置安装和辅助功能选项.

sentences.en: Comparatively, home still is not abounded about the research of accessibility.
sentences.cn: 相对来讲, 国内关于可达性的研究尚不丰富.

sentences.en: Complies with industry standards for data security, browser compatibility, and accessibility.
sentences.cn: 遵守并执行有关数据安全 、 浏览器兼容性, 以及残疾人使用方便等方面的工业标准.

sentences.en: Lube lines are extended through shaft guards for easy accessibility.
sentences.cn: 润滑油填加点延伸到轴防护罩外,容易使用.

sentences.en: Metering ports and body plugs may be interchanged for improved accessibility.
sentences.cn: 测量端口和阀体塞可以互换,以方便接近.

sentences.en: Reflection models the accessibility rules of the common type system.
sentences.cn: “反射”建立常规类型系统的可访问规则模型.

sentences.en: Seminar topics are chosen for their accessibility to a general audience.
sentences.cn: 研讨会内容是以普通听众容易理解为依据作出选择的。

sentences.en: So in this essay we'll discuss both personal accessibility and space accessibility.
sentences.cn: 所以本文将其分为个人可达性和空间可达性.

sentences.en: The accessibility of the extra facilities is important when choosing a property.
sentences.cn: 当你选择置业时,额外设施的价钱是重要的考虑因素.

sentences.en: The essential qualities of such a system are reliability and accessibility;
sentences.cn: 这种方法的基本特点是可靠和易接近。

sentences.en: The GIS - based technique of accessibility measure is discussed also.
sentences.cn: 同时对基于地理信息系统(IS)可达性评价技术作了一定的探讨.

sentences.en: The governing criteria is minimum space and maximum accessibility.
sentences.cn: 指导原则是:占用最小的空间,提供最大的方面.

sentences.en: WAI stands for the Web Accessibility Initiative, and is initiated by W 3 C.
sentences.cn: WAI表示“网页自发访问”, 它是由W3C提出来的.

sentences.en: You can apply these accessibility settings to another computer.
sentences.cn: 您可将这些辅助功能设置应用到另一计算机上.

words.tran_cn: 易接近的；可进入的；可理解的

trans.tran_cn: 易接近，可到达，学习资料利用率，可诣达性，可达性
